content: tidal spring scarf is a beautifully textured crochet scarf a stunning addition to your wardrobe combining simplicity and elegance in every stitch **the tidal scarf is available as a kit with lionbrand you can pick your colors and get yours here 1 ** perfect for transitional weather or breezy summer evenings the repetitive stitch design makes it a relaxing and meditative project ideal for crocheters looking to create something both stylish and functional whether you drape it over your shoulders or wrap it around your neck this scarf adds a soft handmade touch to any outfit difficulty level intermediate terms - us terminology finished measurements 80 by 16 construction note this scarf is made in flat row until your desired length after which you add a round of edging around the whole scarf i would like to see your version of this scarf kindly tag me with your makes using #tidalspringscarf @crochet_fosbas on ig and fosbas on facebook i am happy to answer questions about this pattern kindly contact me at fosbascroceht@gmail com or you can join our community on the facebook group here - https //www facebook com/groups/496008034687310 1 https //shrsl com/4wcvt
